an7.27:4.1: * “Satta vo, bhikkhave, aparihāniye dhamme desessāmi.
an7.27:4.2: Taṃ suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha … pe ….
an7.27:4.3: Katame ca, bhikkhave, satta aparihāniyā dhammā?
an7.27:4.5: vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni.
an7.27:5.1: Yāvakīvañca, bhikkhave, bhikkhū anattasaññaṃ bhāvessanti … pe …
an7.27:5.7: vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihāni.
an7.27:6.1: Yāvakīvañca, bhikkhave, ime satta aparihāniyā dhammā bhikkhūsu ṭhassanti, imesu ca sattasu aparihāniyesu dhammesu, bhikkhū sandississanti;
an7.27:6.2: vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā, no parihānī”ti.
